MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:59pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:03 PM on Thursday, 25 March 2021
